info.title: kplr API
info.description: A secure and scalable API for kplr

post.description: Login user and return access and refresh tokens
Refresh access token using refresh token from cookie or body

get.description: Get current user information
Initiate Google OAuth flow

schema.title: Response Google Auth Initiate Api Auth Google Get

post.description: Handle Google OAuth callback with authorization code (supports both Web and Desktop flows)

schema.title: Response Google Auth Callback Api Auth Google Callback Post

post.description:
Create a new agent session with initial step.

This initializes a new agentic workflow for a user query and automatically
creates the first step to avoid the wasted open_web_browser call.
The session UUID is returned and should be used for all subsequent step executions.

Execute the next step in the agent workflow.

The Electron client sends the current browser state (screenshot + context),
and the backend queries Gemini for the next action(s) to take.

The response contains:
- reasoning: Why the agent is taking this action
- actions: List of Playwright commands to execute
- status: Whether to CONTINUE or COMPLETE the workflow

Mark step actions as executed and save post-execution state.

Called by the Electron client after executing all Playwright actions.
Stores the resulting screenshot and updated context.

get.description: Get the current status of an agent session.
Get the latest screenshot for a session.
Get the complete execution history of a session.

post.description: Return independent UI actions that can be executed from the provided screenshot.

Upload an image file.

The image will be stored in:
- GCP bucket (production)
- Local directory (development)

Returns the file path and public URL for the uploaded image.

Upload a base64 encoded image.

This endpoint is useful for receiving images from the ElectronJS application
that sends screenshots as base64 data.

delete.description:
Delete an image by its file path.

This endpoint allows users to delete images they've uploaded.

get.description:
Get the public URL for an image by its file path.

This endpoint returns the public URL that can be used to access the image.
Get all projects for the current user.

schema.title: Response Get Projects Api Projects  Get

post.description: Create a new project for the current user.

get.description: Get a specific project by ID.

post.description: Create a new test suite for a project.

get.description: Get test suites. If project_id is provided, get test suites for that project.

schema.title: Response Get Test Suites Api Test Suites  Get

get.description: Get a specific test suite by ID.

schema.title: Response Upload Test Suite Attachments Api Test Suites  Test Suite Id  Attachments Post
Response List Test Suite Attachments Api Test Suites  Test Suite Id  Attachments Get

post.description: Create a new scenario for a test suite.

get.description: Get scenarios. If test_suite_id is provided, get scenarios for that test suite.

schema.title: Response Get Scenarios Api Scenarios  Get

get.description: Get a specific scenario by ID.

post.description:
Create a new test run.

Use this endpoint when:
- Running a single scenario: run_type='single', total_scenarios=1
- Running multiple scenarios (Run All): run_type='batch', total_scenarios=N

This allows tracking whether a scenario execution was part of a batch or standalone.

get.description: Get a test run by ID with its associated sessions.

patch.description: Update a test run (e.g., mark as completed, update stats).

delete.description: Delete a test run and all its associated sessions.

get.description: Get all test runs for a specific test suite, ordered by most recent.

schema.title: Response Get Test Runs For Suite Api Test Runs Suite  Test Suite Id  Runs Get

get.description: Get the most recent test run for a test suite.

schema.title: Response Get Latest Test Run Api Test Runs Suite  Test Suite Id  Latest Get

post.description: Mark all 'running' test runs older than 1 hour as 'failed'.

schema.title: Response Cleanup Stuck Runs Api Test Runs Cleanup Stuck Runs Post

post.description:
Generate test scenarios using Gemini 2.5 Flash.
This endpoint uses gemini-2.5-flash (not computer use) to generate text scenarios.

get.description: Get all secrets for the current user (values are masked).

schema.title: Response Get Secrets Api Secrets  Get

get.description: Get a specific secret (value is masked).
Reveal the actual value of a secret (use with caution).

schema.title: Response Reveal Secret Api Secrets  Secret Id  Reveal Get

get.description:
Get dashboard statistics for the current user.

Returns:
- total_test_runs: Total number of test runs
- passed_scenarios: Total number of passed scenarios
- failed_scenarios: Total number of failed scenarios
- success_rate: Overall success rate percentage
Get recent test runs for the dashboard.

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Number of recent runs to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Number of recent runs to return

schema.title: Response List Schedules Api Schedules  Get

parameters.name: hard

schema.description: Set true to permanently delete the schedule.
schema.title: Hard

parameters.description: Set true to permanently delete the schedule.
